targets.expr:
max (
sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$instance", container!="POD"}) by (pod,container)
/
(sum(
    kube_pod_container_resource_limits{ resource="cpu", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$instance"}) by (pod, container))
)
